0: How Much is Too Much? NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Excess Vitamins and Minerals in Food Can Harm Kids’ Health NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Can you get too much of a good thing? NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR When it comes to vitamin A, zinc and niacin, yes you can. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR We need enough of these nutrients for good health, but consuming too much can be harmful – especially to young children, the elderly and pregnant women.
